mapper.sql: ID, MAINID, KCID, SQKSRQ, SQJSRQ, ZT, WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ
mapper.select:
select B.ID, B.MAINID, B.KCID, B.SQKSRQ, B.SQJSRQ, B.ZT, B.WHBMID, B.WHRID, B.WHSJ, T.KCMC, T.IS_FX AS ISFX, T.KCBH, T.FJJX, T.ID AS COURSEID from B_P_00801 B LEFT JOIN B_P_003 T ON T.ID = B.KCID
AND B.ZT = 1 order by T.KCMC
mapper.insert:
insert into B_P_00801
ID,
MAINID,
KCID,
SQKSRQ,
SQJSRQ,
ZT,
WHBMID,
WHRID,
WHSJ,

mapper.update:
update B_P_00801
MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KCID = #{kcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SQKSRQ = #{sqksrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SQJSRQ = #{sqjsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_P_00801 set MAINID = #{mainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KCID = #{kcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SQKSRQ = #{sqksrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SQJSRQ = #{sqjsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
